util.servicebalancer
Class ServiceBalancer<ServiceType extends java.rmi.Remote>

java.lang.Object
  util.servicebalancer.ServiceBalancer<ServiceType>
Type Parameters:
ServiceType - The type of service to balance.
public abstract class ServiceBalancer<ServiceType extends java.rmi.Remote>
extends java.lang.Object

Handles load balancing (and error recovery when possible) for Om service access.

balanceServiceTask

protected <T> T balanceServiceTask(NavigatorServlet.RequestTimings rt,
                                   ServiceBalancer.ServiceTask<T> b)
                        throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Load-balances (retrying across different services) a task.

Parameters:
rt - Receives timing information (may be null)
b - Task to balance
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - If the task fails on all services

getCheckTask

protected abstract ServiceBalancer.ServiceTask<? extends java.lang.Object> getCheckTask()
Returns:
A relatively cheap service task that can be called to check that the remote service is still working. Obviously, this should not have any permanent effect.

checkAvailable

public int checkAvailable()
                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
Checks whether a server is available, throws an exception if all servers fail.

Returns:
Total time taken (ms)
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException

getPerformanceInfo

public org.w3c.dom.Element getPerformanceInfo()
Obtains information about question engine performance.

Returns:
XHTML element that can be added to server status page.
